## serializeToUrlQuery() function

Serialize object to string that is usable as url query parameter

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function serializeToUrlQuery<TObj>(obj: TObj, replacer?: (this: any, key: string, value: any) => any): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | TObj | Object to be serialized |
|  replacer | (this: any, key: string, value: any) =&gt; any | Function that can be used for replacing provided values |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
